StockPriceTool.description: Fetch historical stock prices for one or more ticker symbols from Yahoo Finance. Returns date, open, high, low, close, volume with configurable periods and intervals. No API key needed.

RoutePlannerTool.description: Geocode addresses to coordinates, calculate distances between all location pairs, and find the shortest route using TSP nearest-neighbor. Supports 2-20 locations. Free OpenStreetMap API, no key needed.

CurrencyConverterTool.description: Convert between any two currencies using live exchange rates. Supports 150+ currencies including USD, EUR, GBP, INR, JPY. Free API, no key needed.

WeatherForecastTool.description: Get weather forecasts for any city worldwide. Returns daily temperature, precipitation, wind speed, weather conditions, and identifies rainy days. Uses free Open-Meteo API, no key needed.

SerpSearchTool.description: Search Google using SERP API for web results, images, news, and shopping. Supports location, language, and safe search filters.

WebScraperTool.description: Universal web scraper using BeautifulSoup. Extract text, HTML, tables, links, images, or structured data using CSS selectors.

AdvancedGraphTool.description: Create charts and graphs using Matplotlib. Supports bar, line, scatter, pie, histogram, heatmap, box, and area charts with themes and customization.

GitHubRepoTool.description: Fetch GitHub repository info: overview, commits, issues, PRs, contributors, releases, and languages. Uses GitHub API.

GitHubUserTool.description: Fetch GitHub user profile: bio, repos, starred repos, gists, and activity events. Uses GitHub API.

GitHubTrendingTool.description: Get trending GitHub repositories and developers. Filter by language, time range, and spoken language.

HackerNewsTool.description: Fetch Hacker News stories: top, new, best, ask, show, jobs. Includes scores, authors, and optional comments.

RedditTool.description: Fetch or search posts from any subreddit. Search for specific topics with a query, or browse hot/new/top/rising posts. Supports searching across multiple subreddits at once. Returns titles, text content, scores, authors, and comment counts. No authentication required.
RedditTool.input_type: subreddit name(s) and optional search query

ProductHuntTool.description: Get trending products from Product Hunt. Fetch today's, weekly, or monthly top products with votes and taglines.

GetProgrammingLanguagePopularityTool.description: Get the popularity of programming languages

ExtractCitationsTool.description: Extract citations from the paper 'Attention is All You Need'

BibliographyCreator.description: Create a bibliography from the extracted citations

TableParserTool.description: Parse and structure the extracted tables

ImageProcessorTool.description: Comprehensive image utility. Use this for ALL image processing tasks. Can make image black and white (grayscale), resize, crop, rotate, flip, filter (blur, sharpen), adjust brightness/contrast, and convert formats.

SalesSummaryTool.description: Generate an executive summary of the sales_data.csv file

SentimentAnalysisTool.description: Compare community opinions based on sentiment analysis

RedditSubredditComparator.description: Compare community opinions across subreddits. Takes sentiment analysis data grouped by subreddit and produces a ranked comparison showing sentiment differences between communities.

RedditSentimentAnalyzerTool.description: Analyze sentiment of Reddit posts. Accepts raw text, list of texts, or structured Reddit post data from RedditTool. Returns per-post and aggregate sentiment scores with subreddit grouping.

MermaidDiagramTool.description: Generate Mermaid diagrams from natural language descriptions and render as PNG/SVG images. Supports flowcharts, sequence diagrams, class diagrams, state diagrams, ER diagrams, gantt charts, pie charts, mindmaps, timelines, and git graphs. Provide a description like 'flowchart of user authentication with OAuth' and get rendered diagram image.

DocumentConverterTool.description: Convert documents between PDF, LaTeX, and Markdown formats. Reads input files from the inputs folder. Supports PDF to Markdown, PDF to LaTeX, Markdown to PDF, Markdown to LaTeX, LaTeX to PDF, LaTeX to Markdown. Outputs saved to the output folder.

TextToMarkdownTool.description: Convert extracted text to Markdown format

SlideDeckGeneratorTool.description: Generate professional HTML slide deck presentations from topics or paper content using reveal.js. Uses LLM to distill content into structured slides with bullet points and speaker notes.

LatexEquationRendererTool.description: Render LaTeX mathematical equations as clean PNG images using matplotlib. Supports fractions, integrals, Greek letters, sums, and more. No system TeX installation needed.

QRCodeGeneratorTool.description: Generate QR code images from text, URLs, or any data. Customizable size, border, and colors. Outputs PNG.

AudioSummaryTool.description: Convert text to speech audio (MP3) using Google Text-to-Speech. Supports 50+ languages, adjustable speed. Great for paper abstracts, summaries, notes. No API key required.

CronReminderTool.description: Generate cron schedules and iCalendar (.ics) reminder files from natural language descriptions. Converts 'every Monday at 9am' into cron expressions and downloadable calendar files.
